channel.title: Simple noobish question that i need answered pl0x
channel.description: hey guys. i just wanted to edit one thing on my server. when you right click some1 in a pvp zone it has the "walk here" "attack" "follow" and "trade" buttons show up. i just wanted to change the wording to "attack" to something like "fight" or "own" so can some1 plz tell me how?

item.title: Simple noobish question that i need answered pl0x
item.dc:creator: @_icestorm ~*icestorm*~
item.description:
@_icestorm wrote:

Search this in Client.java outStream.writeString("attack"); and replace attack with your text

Read full topic
item.source: Simple noobish question that i need answered pl0x
